verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> against mountain <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and prophesy against it <S%H5012><s%>,

And say <S%H559><s%> unto it <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Behold <S%H2022><s%>, O mountain Seir <S%H8165><s%>, I am against you <S%H5186><s%>, and I will stretch out my hand <S%H3027><s%> against you <S%H5414><s%>, and I will make you most <S%H4923><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>.
I will lay <S%H7760><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste <S%H2723><s%>, and you shall be desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Because you have had a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> hatred <S%H342><s%>, and have shed <S%H5064><s%> the blood of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the force <S%H3027><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their calamity <S%H343><s%>, in the time <S%H6256><s%> that their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> had a end <S%H7093><s%>:

Therefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, I will prepare <S%H6213><s%> you unto blood <S%H1818><s%>, and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> you <S%H518><s%>: since you have not hated <S%H8130><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, even blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pursue you <S%H7291><s%>.

Thus will I make <S%H5414><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> most <S%H8077><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> from it him that passes out <S%H5674><s%> and him that returns <S%H7725><s%>.

And I will fill <S%H4390><s%> his mountains <S%H2022><s%> with his slain <S%H2491><s%> men <S%H1389><s%>: in your hills, and in your valleys <S%H1516><s%>, and in all your rivers <S%H650><s%>, shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> that are slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

I will make <S%H5414><s%> you perpetual <S%H5769><s%> desolations <S%H8077><s%>, and your cities <S%H5892><s%> shall not return <S%H7725><s%>: and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Because you have said <S%H559><s%>, These two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and these two <S%H8147><s%> countries <S%H776><s%> shall be mine <S%H3423><s%>, and we will possess it <S%H3068><s%>; whereas the Lord was there:

Therefore <S%H2416><s%>, as I live, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, I will even do <S%H6213><s%> according to your anger <S%H639><s%>, and according to your envy <S%H7068><s%> which you have used <S%H6213><s%> out of your hatred <S%H8135><s%> against them <S%H3045><s%>; and I will make myself known among them <S%H8199><s%>, when I have judged you.

And you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and that I have heard <S%H8085><s%> all your blasphemies <S%H5007><s%> which you have spoken <S%H559><s%> against the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, They are laid desolate <S%H8074><s%>, they are given <S%H5414><s%> us to consume <S%H402><s%>.
Thus with your mouth <S%H6310><s%> you have boasted <S%H1431><s%> against me <S%H6280><s%>, and have multiplied your words <S%H1697><s%> against me <S%H8085><s%>: I have heard them.
Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; When the whole earth <S%H776><s%> rejoices <S%H8055><s%>, I will make <S%H6213><s%> you desolate <S%H8077><s%>.

As you did rejoice <S%H8057><s%> at the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, because it was desolate <S%H8074><s%>, so will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto you <S%H8077><s%>: you shall be desolate, O mountain <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, and all Edom <S%H123><s%>, even all of it <S%H3045><s%>: and they shall know that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
